data.text: @SarahInSix Hi Sarah, I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble connecting with our hotline.  Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd like to see what we can do to assist you. Thanks - Jeff

@miu_neonism Hi @miu_neonism, we’re sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled and understand how this can affect your travel plans. Would you be able to send us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi

@couchybaxter Hi @couchybaxter, we’re sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled and that this affected your travel plans. Could you please send us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks – Vi
@rspencer027 Hi Ron, sorry to hear about this. Should you need to discuss a specific booking or require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi

@mmccarthybrett Thanks for reaching out @mmccarthybrett. That’s definitely not the experience we want our customers to have and we are sorry to hear this was your experience. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d like to look into this further for you. Thanks – Mauri
@DanielJack93 Hi Daniel, sorry to hear this - we do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. Could you send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist? Thanks - Jaya
@SuDharmapala Hi Su, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Could you please send us a DM so we can look into this for you? Thanks - Leslie

@mrbarlow Hi there, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. - Jaya

@east13Melbourne Hi @east13Melbourne, we’re sorry to hear this. We never like having to cancel a flight, however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy

@elisethoma5 Hi Elise, we’re sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we do our best to avoid cancellations. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@Boendy1 Hi Chris, I understand how a cancelled flight can affect your travel plans. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks – Mauri

@dontwrrybhappyy Hi @dontwrrybhappyy, sorry to hear about your experience. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Kimmy

@DocB__ Hi Ron, thanks for reaching out. Fares change as we manage the performance of flights and respond to seasonal customer demands. This means that fares becomes higher when a lot of passengers booked the same flight. Thanks - Kimmy

@justmaddyx Hi Maddyx, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight - we never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Jaya

@melody_salehi Hi Melody, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled and I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
@csjensen68 Hi Catherine, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this for you. Thanks - Leslie
@maximeadows Hi there, sorry to hear your daughter's flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Leslie
@g_dawg5 Hi there, I understand how inconvenient a cancelled flight can be, however, sometimes it’s unavoidable. Could you please DM us so we can look into things for you? - Leslie

@plbarlow Hi Paige, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled and I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi

@VonniePrz Hi Feliz, I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference and full name? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff

@cahai Hi cahai. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan
@MariaRalcala Hi Maria, would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further and see what we can do. - Paul

@lukehgomes Hi Luke, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff

@JackStanley86 Hi Jack, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy
@cyrhen Hi Cyrhen, sorry to hear about this. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks – Vi

@SpiceLearning Hi Carol, sorry to hear about your difficulties with requesting a refund. We'd like to check this further for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@angusmunro89 Hi Angus, we never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with a specific booking, you may send us a DM so we can look into it and see what we can do. - Paul
@zqnneil Hi Neil, we’d appreciate the chance to look into this further and see what we can do. Could you send us a DM with more info so we can assist? - Paul
@aussiemate38 @aussiemate38 Hi there, sorry to hear about the delay. Could you send us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this for you. - Paul
@in_reverie If you need to discuss this further, you may send us a DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Jeff 2/2

@in_reverie Hi there, if you need to make changes to your booking after it's been finalized, change fees and any fare difference between the flight you booked and the cost of your new preferred flight may apply. 1/2

@AlexanderJenner Hi Alexander, sorry to hear about what happened. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require further assistance with your booking, you may send us a DM so we can look into this. - Paul

@adriennegorra Hi Adrienne, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff
@aimee_fontaine Hi Aimee, I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. If you need further assistance, you may send us a DM with your booking reference. Thanks - Jeff

@claud_maurice Hi Maurice, sorry to hear this has been your experience. Should you need to discuss this further or require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
@BreannaMezz Hi Breanna, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff

@Bendigodaz Hi @Bendigodaz, sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed. We do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. Should you need to discuss a specific booking or require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM. Thanks - Vi

@Whereis_Jyrki Hi @Whereis_Jyrki, sorry to hear about this. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent.  Thanks – Vi

@missspelling2 Hi Jill, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy
@BeckSullivanSLP Hi Rebecca, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff

@melbbhoy Hi @melbbhoy, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you be able to send us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi

@NessaJ89 Hi Vanessa, sorry to hear this. If we need to make changes to your flight times we try to let you know as soon as possible and we're sorry if this was not the case for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@NovaWeetman Hi Nova, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@andreakirby189 Hi there, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference and full name? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff

@mike_j_sexton Hi Mike, sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you need further assistance, you may send us a DM with more info. Thanks - Jeff

@Jodie3735 Hi Jodie, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. To help you with your reimbursement request, you may send us a DM with your booking reference for further assistance. Thanks - Jeff
@JDoesTweets Hi James, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. – Jeff
@MiaFerreira Hi Mia, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into this further? Thanks - Leslie

@Justuporn Hi Justin, sorry to hear about this, and understand this can be upsetting for you. Should you need to discuss a specific booking or require any assistance, feel free to send us a DM so we can look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi

@Mitch18Two Hi Mitch, that’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself. If you're calling from Australia, you may use 131 538. Alternatively, you may send us a DM here and we'd be happy to assist. Thanks - Jen
@jazza1983 Hi Jarrod, thanks for reaching out. Could you please send us a DM with more info? Thanks - Dan
@jason_04 Hi Jay, sorry to hear your wife's flight was delayed. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can check this further? Thanks - Leslie

@SpazFromRainman Hi @SpazFromRainman, sorry to hear this. I understand how upsetting travel changes can be. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@Paula4Geelong Hi Paula, sorry to hear your son's flight was delayed. I know having a delayed flight is never a good feeling and we do our best to avoid delays as much as possible. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need any further assistance. Thanks - Norine
@spidouxMA84 Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Would you be able to send us a DM with your sister's booking details? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Leslie

@calebsfavourite Hi there, I'm sorry to know that your niece's flight to Bali has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks – Mauri

domain.name: Business Taxonomy

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

data.text: @jnorris_108 Hi Jake. Sorry to hear that your partner's flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan
@bigpotato1523 Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Would you be able to send us a DM with your booking details so we can look into it further? Thanks - Leslie

@LivseyRoger Hi Roger. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a PM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan
@Matty2002au12 Hi Matty, thanks for getting in touch. If you would like assistance with booking direct flights from Syd-Mel, feel free to send us a DM. We’d be happy to assist. Thanks - Jaya
@brettalewis3 Thanks for reaching out Brett. We’re sorry for the inconvenience caused and we’d like to look into this for you. Could you please send us a DM with more info? Thanks- Jaya

@Shabby169 Hi Shabby, I'm sorry to hear you haven't received any updates about your flights. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into it further. Thanks - Norine

@iwyuteotl Hi there. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan
@emmastanford11 Hi Emma, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Jaya

@Higgo74 Hi Higgo. We’re sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan

@duckboy6 Hi there, I'm sorry to know your flight got delayed. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please DM us to look into this. Thanks – Mauri
@Horsfall62Sue Hi Suzanne, sorry to know you are having trouble with making a payment. Would you mind sending us a DM to look into this for you? Thanks – Mauri

@amitjzaveri Hi Amit, I understand you're concern about your flight's itinerary. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@jvxcec That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Jen.  Could you please send us a DM so we can see how can we assist further? Thanks - Jen

@coachcamw Hi @coachcamw thanks for reaching out. I can see that a case has been created for you and your case manager will be in touch shortly. If there’s anything more we can do for you, please feel free to send us a DM. We’d be happy to assist. Thanks- Jay

@dlewis67 Hi David, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need further assistance, you may send us a DM with your booking reference number. Thanks - Jeff

@ruban240899 Hi Ruban, sorry to hear that your flight was impacted by multiple disruptions. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference and full name? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff

@pm_phd Hi there. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan

@molecreeky Hi there, we’re really sorry to hear about your experience and appreciate this has been a very frustrating situation for you. Could you please send us a DM to see how can we assist further? Thanks - Jen

@maria_mac1 Hi Maria, our sincere condolences for your loss. We’re sorry to hear about the flight disruptions you've experienced in what must be a very difficult time for you. Could you please send us a DM so we can see how we can help? Thanks - Leslie
@jaayraad91 1/2 Please DM us and provide your booking details for us to follow up asap. Thanks- Jen

@jaayraad91 1/1 Hello, we’re sorry for the disruption and inconvenience this has caused you. Our customer team has booked you on a replacement flight later today, but we would be happy to discuss this in more detail and see what further support we can provide.
@sugardumpling90 Hi JQ, I understand that you'd like to know the reason why JQ37 got cancelled. Could you please send us a DM here? We'd love the chance to check this further for you. Thanks - Jen
@itsybitsychinee Hi Jenneth, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy
@juan_jflorez Hi Juan, sorry to hear that you're having issues with using Jetstar app. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff
@gavinsandilands Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM please - we may be able to provide more details about your delayed flight. Thanks - Leslie

@JamesAritonovic Hi James, I know it must have been upsetting to have to pay for excess baggage. We take care to advise our passengers to add baggage allowance before the flight as it's more expensive at the airport. Feel free to send us a DM if you need to discuss this further. Thanks - Leslie

@kursorcreative Hi MattP,. Sorry to hear that your flight was delayed - If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM with more info. Thanks - Dan

@theunbeliever69 Hi Pee, sorry to hear that you're having trouble with using Jetstar App. It may help to uninstall and reinstall your app. Alternatively, you may visit our website here https://t.co/sVClA37Hmo to manually search for flights. Thanks - Jeff

urls.title: Book Cheap Flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Jetstar offers low fares all day every day from Australia's best cheap flights airline.

data.text: @DanielJack93 Hi Daniel, sorry to hear your flight has been delayed. Feel free to send us a DM if you require assistance with your booking. Thanks - Leslie

@BRLEE96 Hi Brooklyn, I understand how frustrating it is to be affected by cancellation -  we never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM.  - Jaya

@missmcaldwell That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, Margaret. Would you mind sending us a PM with your booking details? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff
@jzkliger That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, @jzkliger.  Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jaya

@ScienceManu Hi Manuela, I'm sorry to hear about the delay with your refund and I appreciate it might be frustrating to wait. Could you please send us a DM with some more info? We'd love the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jen

@plalor Hi Peter, I’m sorry to hear this. We never like having to cancel a flight and we’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks – Jaya
@sweetorange34 Hi Ingrid, sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. I'd be happy to check this now - can you send us a DM with more info? Thanks - Dan

@RugbyMates Hi @RugbyMates, sorry to hear that your flight has been rescheduled, we understand how frustrating this can be. Should you need to discuss a specific booking or require any assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi

@DrSumaiyasayed Hi, I’m sorry to hear you haven’t received an update on your case yet. I can see that a case has been created and so any update will be communicated by your case manager. You are also able to reply to the email thread should you have any further queries. Thanks - Dan

@kch7777 Hi there, I'm sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled and one of your bags has been missing - I certainly understand how inconvenient it is. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and you can reach them here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Norine

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @asjzhou Hi Alexander, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was changed. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference? We'd like to check this further. Thanks - Jeff

@Ang_clori Hi there, I understand your concern about your upcoming flight. If we need to make changes to your flight times, we will let you know as soon as possible to give you enough time to review your travel plans. You can check your flight status here https://t.co/9Dv79Ldvey. - Jaya

@FlavioBasto1 Hi Flavio, we’re sorry to hear about your cancelled flight - we know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Jaya

@Here_Tweet_Alex @Here_Tweet_Alex Hi there, sorry to hear about what happened. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM with your booking details. - Paul

@GloryHammer2 Hi Sean, sorry to hear this has been your daughter's experience, however, we do have to close check-in and boarding at the exact time we’re instructed to. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you can send us with a DM so we can assist. Thanks - Vi

@meynewyatt Hi Meyne, sorry to hear about what happened. I understand that you want to claim your expenses due to your flight cancellation. Could you send us a DM  with more info so we can discuss your options and assist? - Paul
